title: The Other World
description: Peopled with prostitutes, circus performers, sociopaths, and god-fearing families, these stories have a hallucinatory edge, making the everyday seem like another world.John Wynne is the author of Crime Wave, a novel, and The Sightings, a chapbook. His work has appeared in the Paris Review, American Poetry Review, and High Risk 2. He lives in New York City.
author: John Stewart Wynne
